com.googlecode.gwtmvc.client
Class Event<V,A extends java.lang.Enum>

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.gwtmvc.client.Event<V,A>
Type Parameters:
V - action
A - value
public class Event<V,A extends java.lang.Enum>
extends java.lang.Object

Represents an event on the gui. Note for lexical definition: It is different from the gwt 1.6 handler/event system, But a gwt-mvc Event will generally be created by a listener/handler of user gestures USAGE: create an event to notify a user gesture to the controller

          Builds an event
